name: persona_generation
system: You are a strategic B2B marketer. You output valid JSON only. Each persona should help a growth team understand who to target. Do not include explanations.
template:
Using the following company context, create exactly 3 buyer personas.

Context JSON:
{{context}}

Return JSON shaped as {"personas": [ {"persona_id": string, "name": string, "role": string, "company_size": string, "motivations": [string], "pain_points": [string], "preferred_channels": [string], "tone": string } ] }.

persona_id must be UUIDv4 values that you generate. Keep motivations and pain_points sharp (max 4 entries each).
